thread.title: Ryan urges 'more surgical approach' than Trump's tariff plan

title: Ryan urges 'more surgical approach' than Trump's tariff plan
text:
Ryan urges 'more surgical approach' than Trump's tariff plan Tuesday, March 06, 2018 - 00:57 
House Speaker Paul Ryan told reporters on Tuesday that while that dumping of steel and aluminum was clearly ''abuse'', President Trump's proposed solution of imposing steep tariffs is ''a little too broad'' and that a ''more surgical'' approach is needed. Rough cut (no reporter narration).   
House Speaker Paul Ryan told reporters on Tuesday that while that dumping of steel and aluminum was clearly "abuse", President Trump's proposed solution of imposing steep tariffs is "a little too broad" and that a "more surgical" approach is needed. Rough cut (no reporter narration).  //in.reuters.com/video/2018/03/06/ryan-urges-more-surgical-approach-than-t?videoId=406666521&videoChannel=13423
